text: "You're Sixteen" is a 1960 song by Johnny Burnette and went to number 3 in the United Kingdom and number 8 in the United States. ==Ringo Starr version== In 1973, Ringo Starr released his version of You're Sixteen from his third studio album Ringo. It topped the single charts in the United States and New Zealand. It went to number 2 in Canada and Ireland, number 3 in South Africa, number 4 in the United Kingdom and number 6 in Australia, the Netherlands, Norway and Switzerland. Category:1960 songs Category:Ringo Starr songs
title: You're Sixteen
